name: Morning Market Briefing
prompt: Run a morning market briefing. Use the botcore CLI to: 1) `botcore get_market_prices` for current prices. 2) `botcore get_market_overview` for 24h stats. 3) `botcore get_ai_analysis '{"symbol":"BTCUSDT"}'` for BTC outlook. 4) `botcore get_paper_trades_open` for open positions. Format as a concise Telegram message: current prices with 24h % change, any AI signals, open position status, one-sentence outlook. Keep under 500 characters.
